price: Hakika mimi nimemkuta mwanamke anawatawala, naye amepewa kila kitu, na anacho kiti cha enzi kikubwa.
arabic: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَلَهَا عَرۡشٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: Hakika mimi nimewaona watu wa Sabai wanatawaliwa na mwanamke, na amepewa kila kheri za kidunia, naye ana kiti cha enzi kikubwa kinacho onyesha dalili ya utukufu wa ufalme na nguvu za madaraka yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innī wajadttu im'ra-atan tamlikuhum waūtiyat min kulli shayin walahā ʿarshun ʿaẓīmun
